name: router-performance-check
description: Performance comparison between React Router, TanStack Router, and Next.js App Router

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:react-router" "npm run dev:tanstack-router" "npm run dev:next"
scripts.build: npm run build:react-router && npm run build:tanstack-router && npm run build:next
scripts.build:analyze: npm run build:analyze:react-router && npm run build:analyze:tanstack-router && npm run build:analyze:next
scripts.install:all: npm run install:react-router && npm run install:tanstack-router && npm run install:next
scripts.clean: npm run clean:react-router && npm run clean:tanstack-router && npm run clean:next
scripts.clean:react-router: cd react-router && rm -rf build dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.clean:tanstack-router: cd tanstack-router && rm -rf build dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.clean:next: cd next && rm -rf .next build dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:react-router && npm run typecheck:tanstack-router && npm run typecheck:next
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "npm run start:prod:react-router" "npm run start:prod:tanstack-router" "npm run start:prod:next"
